original: intros q p Hprime_p Hprime_q Hdivides_pq. apply mult_is_one. simpl in Hdivides_pq. apply is_gcd_sym in Hprime_p. apply is_lcm_sym in Hprime_q. apply is_gcd_fun with (r1:=1) in Hprime_p. apply is_gcd_fun with (r1:=1) in Hprime_q. apply is_gcd_moduplus with (k:=0) in Hprime_q. apply bezout_sc with (p:=p) (q:=q) (a:=1) (b:=1) (m:=0). rewrite <- Hdivides_pq. rewrite Hprime_q. rewrite Hprime_p. left. constructor. left. constructor. left. constructor. apply divides_div in Hdivides_pq. rewrite Hdivides_pq. auto.
